Verses: 1 maarupaadaana Udhadugalulla Moodanaippaarkkilum, Uththamanaai Nadakkira Dhariththirane Vaasi.
2 aaththumaa Arivillaamaliruppadhu Nalladhalla; Kaal Thuridhamaanavan Thappinadakkiraan.
3 manushanudaiya Madhiyeenam Avan Vazhiyaith Thaarumaaraakkum; Endraalum Avan Manam Karththarukku Virodhamaaith Thaangaladaiyum.
4 selvam Anega Snegidharai Serkkum; Dhariththirano Than Snegidhanaalum Negizhappaduvaan.
5 poisaatchikkaaran Aakkinaikkuth Thappaan; Poigalaip Pesugiravanum Thappuvadhillai.
6 prabuvin Dhayaiyai Anegar Varundhik Ketpaargal; Kodai Kodukkiravanukku Evanum Snegidhan.

7 dhariththiranai Avanudaiya Sagodhararellaarum Pagaikkiraargale, Eththanai Adhigamaai Avan Snegidhar Avanukku Dhooramaavaargal; Avargaludaiya Vaarththaigalai Avan Naadugiraan, Avaigalo Verum Vaarththaigale.
8 gnaanaththaip Petrukkollugiravan Than Aaththumaavai Snegikkiraan; Buththiyaik Kaakkiravan Nanmaiyadaivaan.
9 poisaatchikkaaran Aakkinaikkuth Thappaan; Poigalaip Pesugiravan Naasamadaivaan.
10 moodanukku Selvam Thagaadhu; Prabukkalai Aandukolvadhu Adimaikku Evvalavum Thagaadhu.
11 manushanudaiya Vivegam Avan Kobaththai Adakkum; Kutraththai Mannippadhu Avanukku Magimai.
12 raajaavin Kobam Singaththin Gerchchippukku Samaanam; Avanudaiya Dhayai Pullinmel Peyyum Panipolirukkum.
13 moodanaagiya Magan Than Thagappanukku Migundha Dhukkam; Manaiviyin Sandaigal Oyaadha Ozhukku.
14 veedum Aasthiyum Pidhaakkal Vaikkum Sudhandharam; Buththiyulla Manaiviyo Karththar Arulum Eevu.
15 sombal Thoongivizhappannum; Asadhiyaanavan Pattiniyaayiruppaan.
16 kattalaiyaik Kaaththukkollugiravan Than Aaththumaavaik Kaakkiraan; Than Vazhigalai Avamadhikkiravan Saavaan.
17 ezhaikku Irangugiravan Karththarukkuk Kadankodukkiraan; Avan Koduththadhai Avar Thirumbak Koduppaar.
18 nambikkaiyirukkumattum Un Maganai Sitchaichey; Aanaalum Avanaik Kolla Un Aaththumaavai Ezhumbavottaadhe.
19 katunkobi Aakkinaikkullaavaan; Nee Avanaith Thappuviththaal Thirumbavum Thappuvikkavendiyadhaai Varum.
20 un Andhiyakaalaththil Nee Gnaanamullavanaayirukkumpadi, Aalosanaiyaikkettu, Buththimadhiyai Etrukkol.
21 manushanudaiya Irudhayaththin Ennangal Anegam; Aanaalum Karththarudaiya Yosanaiye Nilainirkum.
22 nanmaiseyya Manushan Kondirukkum Aasaiye Dhayai; Poiyanaip Paarkkilum Dhariththiran Vaasi.
23 karththarukku Bayappadudhal Jeevanukkedhuvaanadhu; Adhai Adaindhavan Thrupthiyadaindhu Nilaiththiruppaan; Theemai Avanai Anugaadhu.
24 somberi Than Kaiyaik Kalaththile Vaiththu, Adhaith Thirumbath Than Vaayandaikku Edukkaamalirukkiraan.
25 pariyaasakkaaranai Adi, Appozhudhu Pedhai Echcharikkappaduvaan; Buththimaanaik Kadindhukol, Avan Arivullavanaavaan.
26 than Thagappanaik Kollaiyadiththu, Than Thaayaith Thuraththividugiravan, Lachchaiyaiyum Avamaanaththaiyum Undaakkugira Magan.
27 en Magane, Arivaith Tharum Vaarththaigalai Vittu Vilagachcheyyum Podhagangalai Nee Kelaadhe.
28 peliyaalin Saatchikkaaran Nyaayaththai Nindhikkiraan; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Vaai Akkiramaththai Vizhungum.
29 pariyaasakkaararukkuth Thandanaigalum, Moodarudaiya Mudhugukku Adigalum Aayaththamaayirukkiradhu.
